verbs.description: Paul Manafort , the former chairman of President Donald Trump 's campaign , [V: is] resorting to increasingly risky moves to avoid pleading guilty to a charge from the special counsel Robert Mueller which accuses him of violating the Foreign Agents Registration Act .
